Text.Value: Forgive the paranoia - we're being hunted by a vile and wicked hag. We sought refuge here, but -

EditorData.NodeContext: worried - she and the group are in a tense situation with their back against a wall (metaphorically)

Text.Value: Mayrina - our leader - was on to something. Unfortunately, Ethel found out - how, I don't know.
Don't listen - who knows what spells it weaves around us? Quickly, cleric!

EditorData.NodeContext: serious, determined

Text.Value: If you pissed off a hag, you're screwed.
Yes. She's spoken of you many times. I confess it's strange meeting you in the flesh. You look so... normal.

EditorData.NodeContext: a small smile

Text.Value: THERE! THE DOLL! THE DOLL!

EditorData.NodeContext: panicked flailing and pointing at the ground in front of him

Text.Value: You're the one that saved her? The one that ventured to the depths of Ethel's lair? I can hardly believe it - you look so... normal.

EditorData.NodeContext: surprise and admiration

Text.Value: Stay your hand, Sister - I also worship He of the Watchful Eye.
You see, all of us here have fallen victim to a hag's vicious ways. But instead of succumbing to despair, we rose above it.

EditorData.NodeContext: determined - she's picked herself up from rock bottom

Text.Value: Let me have a look at this hex - maybe I can help.
By Helm, perhaps there is hope. If anyone can help Mayrina, it's you. She's upstairs, but be warned, she's not as you remember her.

EditorData.NodeContext: hope in the first half, sadness in the second (mayrina has been turned into a sheep)

Text.Value: Then you see the truth they've kept hidden - that they can be defeated.
Thanks to Mayrina, our leader. Together, we've been helping others who've suffered at the claws of a hag.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

Text.Value: Study the doll.
A hag is after you? I can help. I've fought one before.
Blast it all. We need to find it, before it hexes us.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Gwen Lee] Custom anim of voodoo doll disappearing into thin air.
EditorData.NodeContext: cursing - the doll has vanished and they need to find it - immediately
EditorData.SFXTags: [WI] [GUS-228065] Audio support as the doll vanish, giggle echoes
EditorData.VFXTags: [WI] [GUS-228065] VFX for when the doll vanish

Text.Value: Why is she hunting you?
Spread out! Tear the house apart if you have to!

EditorData.NodeContext: a command to the group, gestures to spread out - determined and strong willed

Text.Value: I've fought enough hags for one lifetime.
Hehe.

EditorData.NodeContext: creepy giggle

Text.Value: She hexed Mayrina in recompense - and everything we've done to try to lift it has been for naught.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

Text.Value: Only... Mayrina's been hexed by the very hag who now hunts us.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

Text.Value: Because we dared to do the impossible - we dared to fight back.

EditorData.NodeContext: determined

Text.Value: *Magic infuses every thread - allowing the doll to teleport, curse, and do harm. However, with the right spell, it could be negated.*
Mayrina? I know her. I saved her and her child.
I've fought enough hags for one lifetime.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Gwen Lee] Custom anim of voodoo doll popping out from thin air, drops on the floor standing upright and rigid, giggling.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Doll appears standing upright and rigid
EditorData.SFXTags: [WI] [GUS-228065] Audio support for when the doll appear, giggling
EditorData.VFXTags: [WI] [GUS-228065] VFX for when the doll appear

Text.Value: I'll send your head back to your mistress, you wretched scum.

EditorData.NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start

Text.Value: Touch me and I'll hurt you more than Auntie Ethel will.
Grab the doll.
I found a note in the Blushing Mermaid - it led me here.
We will not bow to your evil terror, beast. Helm guide us!

EditorData.NodeContext: serious, determined - combat about to start

Text.Value: To think like that is to give in to despair, which is exactly what a hag wants - Mayrina taught us that.

EditorData.NodeContext: trying to be determined but is really just sad - she cares about mayrina and is worried for her

Text.Value: We're on the same side - I'm trying to find a way to kill Auntie Ethel.
Lies. I'll cleave you in two and send your corpse to your mistress, scum.

EditorData.NodeContext: serious and determined - combat about to start

Text.Value: Touch me and I'll hurt you more than any bloody hag could.
Hag trickery! Don't let it -

EditorData.NodeContext: stern warning, trying to tell the group not to let it get away

Text.Value: Mayrina? I know her! She was captured by Auntie Ethel.
I WILL EAT YOUR SOULS, RAAAAAH.
Come, then - I could do with a warm-up.
The hells is that?!
I've fought a hag before. No easy task.
At ease, everyone. We may have found ourselves an ally.

EditorData.NodeContext: relieved

Text.Value: Mayrina showed us how to stand on our own two feet - how to fight back. Then Ethel found us.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere, clearly cares about mayrina

Text.Value: Helm, protector of all, grant me the power to ignite this creature's flesh and burn its bones to ash. Begone, monster - your hag mother holds no power here!

EditorData.NodeContext: some kind of hand gesture here like she's conjuring something

Text.Value: *Sniff.* Wait - Kled smells no lie.

EditorData.NodeContext: sniffs the air, surprised

Text.Value: Then you speak truth? You've fought a hag before?

EditorData.NodeContext: surprised

Text.Value: An intruder? These people are under my protection, I'll not let you harm them!

EditorData.NodeContext: Surprised, the springs to action - stepping forward, ready to defend the group

Text.Value: Looks like you're in for rough times.
She's upstairs, but be warned, she's not as you remember her.

EditorData.NodeContext: sadness

Text.Value: Calm down! I seek no trouble!
Wait! I'm no hagspawn - I'm a faithful adherent, just like you.
You bested Ethel?

EditorData.NodeContext: surprised

Text.Value: Forgive the paranoia - we're being hunted by a vile and wicked hag. We feared you her minion. She's already hexed one of us - and any of us could be next.

EditorData.NodeContext: worried - she and the group are in a tense situation with their back against a wall (metaphorically)

Text.Value: I'm trying to figure out a way to kill Auntie Ethel - any ideas?
Wait! I know her. She saved me from Auntie Eh- Eh- Ethel.
Wait! I know him. He saved me from Auntie Eh- Eh- Ethel.
Wait! I know them. They saved me from Auntie Eh- Eh- Ethel.
I hate dolls.
I'm [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53]. Nice to meet you.
She is upstairs - you cannot miss her.

EditorData.NodeContext: sadness

Text.Value: Wait! No hag spawn would speak like that.

EditorData.NodeContext: confused, holds out a hand to stop the rest of the group from attacking

Text.Value: What in the hells are you doing?
You've dealt with Ethel? I'm shocked you're alive.
We've exhausted our spells - I was contemplating salt-throwing and other childish superstitions when you arrived, so I'll not refuse your help.

EditorData.NodeContext: frustrated with herself that she can't do more

Text.Value: Be careful!

EditorData.NodeContext: worried

Text.Value: Hearken to my words, wicked creature. Return to the pit of evil from whence you came!
Not necessarily.
Really? You should join us, then.

EditorData.NodeContext: sincere - always happy to welcome someone who has dealt with a hag

Text.Value: Forgive the welcome, but we're being hunted by a hag - the vicious Ethel herself. We feared you her minion. She's already hexed one of us - and any of us could be next.

EditorData.NodeContext: worried - she and the group are in a tense situation with their back against a wall (metaphorically)

Text.Value: Wait! No Ethel spawn would speak like that.

EditorData.NodeContext: confused, holds out a hand to stop the rest of the group from attacking

Text.Value: Not myself, but our leader Mayrina has.

Synopsis:
Group dialogue that happens when any of the hag survivors spots a player. Happens in hags survivors building, downstairs, where all of the survivros are gathered. Provides narrative explanation to players who are the survivors and what bothers them.

Should not be repeatable!
